trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.

However, if the event is cancelled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The previous display position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
The new display position for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> that is being reordered.
Gets the new display position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.

However, if the event is cancelled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
The new display position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
Gets the previous display position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.

However, if the event is cancelled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
The previous display position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>
